entry.title: Weaver Leather Basic Adjustable Chin and Throat Snap Halter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weaver Leather
Type: Nylon Halters
Price: 19.95

When you're looking for the perfect combination of dependability and value, Weaver Leather's Basic halters are the right choice. With features like brass plated hardware, box-stitching at stress points, oblong buckle holes and a sewn-in throat snap, this 1" nylon halter is a great buy.

entry.title: Derby Originals Desert Rose Collection Rose Gold Reflective Safety Flex-Webb Horse Halters with Matching Lead Ropes
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Nylon Halters
Price: 32.99 - 39.99 (18 variants)

Derby Originals brand new Desert Rose Collection of halters and lead ropes are the newest line of premium quality horse halters and lead ropes on the market. These unique and modern tack pieces feature innovative and elegant Rose Gold and Blackout nickel-plated hardware that is unlike anything else offered before. Our hardware is not only breathtaking in its beauty and quality but was designed to hold up strong for long-term use. Derby Originals Desert Rose Collection was designed to emulate the colors, feel, and beauty of the American Southwest in every stunning detail. We meticulously designed these Desert Rose halters and leads right here in the U.S.A. and are proud to be able to stand behind our products and offer a one year warranty on these products. Derby Originals’ Desert Rose Collection halters are available in two styles, stable halters that feature an adjustable nylon crown, and breakaway halters which feature modern and innovative Flex-Webb crowns. These crowns are designed to provide the safety breakaway benefits of a traditional leather crown, without needing special care, regular cleaning, or eventually deteriorating over time like leather will. These gorgeous halters are available in five colors inspired by the natural landscape of the American desert: Midnight Black, Cactus Green, Coral, Red Sand, and Turquoise. Derby Originals line of Desert Rose halters are also available in four sizes: Miniature Horse, Cob/Arab, Full Horse, and Oversize/Warmblood, which means our halters will fit almost any equine. Please be aware when reading past reviews (before October 2020) that we experienced a small quality issue with our lead ropes where they wore quickly. This was quickly corrected and fixed and this issue has been totally eradicated. We are providing full warranty coverage for any issues previous buyers experienced. We stand behind our products and want our customers to have full confidence in purchasing from us.

  • EXCLUSIVE ROSE GOLD HARDWARE - Derby Originals’ premium halter series features stunning engraved rose gold plated nickel hardware that is attractive, modern, and designed to last. These unique halters are sure to stand out at barns, shows, and events.
  • INNOVATIVE FLEX-WEBB CROWN DESIGN - these unique crowns provide the same safety benefits of a leather crown but don't need special care and will not deteriorate over time. This halter is perfect for owners looking for a better breakaway alternative!
  • NEW REFLECTIVE DESIGN INCREASES SAFETY - our halters are the first on the market to feature 360° rolled reflective trim to increase visibility from all angles and help protect your horse when around cars, during hunting season, or at crowded events.
  • MATCHING SET INCLUDES A HALTER AND LEAD ROPE - each one of our unique halters includes a matching lead rope made of thick, plush, ultra-soft braided poly rope. Sizes Cob, Full Horse, and Oversize include a 10' lead and Mini Horse includes a 7' lead.
  • INCLUDES A ONE YEAR WARRANTY - Derby Originals' premium halter and lead sets come with a one year warranty that protects against quality or manufacturing defects. Visit derbyoriginals.com to learn more and register your product warranty now.

entry.title: Weaver Adjustable Nylon Halter with Throat Snap
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weaver Leather
Type: Nylon Halters
Price: 19.99

The same original quality-made nylon halter you know and love. Crafted for the ultimate in comfort, performance, and beauty, this 1" halter features heat-sealed oblong buckle holes, box-stitching at stress points and a rolled throat. Brass plated hardware (except looped-on throat snap is solid brass). Be sure to check out the matching lead rope or change it up and mix and match the halter and lead rope colors. (Lead rope sold separately)

  • Made of quality nylon
  • Box-stitching at stress points
  • Comfort rolled throat
  • Heat-sealed oblong buckle holes
  • Brass plated hardware (except looped-on throat snap is solid brass)

entry.title: Weaver Leather Breakaway Original Adjustable Chin and Throat Snap Halter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weaver Leather
Type: Nylon Halters
Price: 28.99

A soft, supple burgundy latigo leather crown is the perfect addition to our popular original nylon halter. This convenient breakaway halter features a 1" nylon construction, oblong buckle holes, box-stitching at stress points, a comfortable rolled throat and true-to-fit sizing. Also features brass plated double crown buckles and a sewn-in, non-rust solid brass throat snap. 

  • 1" Nylon Halter
  • Soft Supple Burgundy Latigo Leather Crown
  • Heat Sealed Buckle Holes
  • Box Stitching at Stress Points
  • Made by Weaver Leather Mt. Hope, Ohio

entry.title: Weaver Leather Classic Nylon Horse Halter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weaver Leather
Type: Nylon Halters
Price: 20.95

  • This 1" halter was crafted from the highest quality nylon.
  • Features include solid brass eyelets and tips.
  • Also features a comfortable rolled throat design and diamond stitching with color-coordinated thread.
  • Solid brass hardware (except rings are brass plated).
Small - 500 - 800 lbs.

entry.title: Derby Originals Fleece Padded Nylon Horse Halter - Available in Multiple Sizes and Colors- CLOSEOUT
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tack Wholesale
Type: Nylon Halters
Price: 9.99 - 11.99 (18 variants)

**These halters have been greatly discounted for quick sale due to overstock. These halters are not eligible for return or refund**

Derby Originals Fleece Padded Nylon Horse Halter is a great option for any horse owner looking for a cute new halter for their horse thanks to this halter’s fun and colorful design and huge range of size and color options. This halter features a silver running horse overlay along the noseband and cheeks, as well as removable and washable fleece padding on the nose and crown.

  • THE PERFECT EVERYDAY HALTER - our double-layered fleece padded nylon halters are perfect for everyday use thanks to their comfortable fit.

  • INCLUDES REMOVABLE & WASHABLE FLEECE PADDING - our unique halters include fleece padding on the noseband and crown that attaches with velcro and can be removed and machine washed.
  • A HALTER OPTION FOR EVERY HORSE - this halter is available in a wide range of sizes to fit every horse from mini horses and foals, to draft horses. We offer the sizes Suckling, Weanling, Yearling, Pony, Small Horse, Cob/Arab, Full Horse, and Draft.
  • UNIQUE SATIN HARDWARE FINISH - our halters are made of a durable and strong satin finish zinc hardware that stands out.
  • AVAILABLE IN SIX COLORS - our nylon halters are available in six fun colors to suit you and your horse: Pink, Black, Baby Blue, Hunter Green, Burgundy, and Lilac.

    Colors may slightly vary from lot to lot. Hardware and color of the horses on halter vary between gold and silver. 

     

    Size Chart

    Suckling (100-200 lbs)
    Crownpiece: 13-17"
    Cheeks: 4.5"
    Noseband: 17-20"

    Weanling (200-300 lbs)
    Crownpiece: 14-18"
    Cheeks: 6"
    Noseband: 18-21"

    Yearling (300-500 lbs)
    Crownpiece: 16-20"
    Cheeks: 6.5"
    Noseband: 19-22"

    Average Pony (400-750 lbs) (Labeled "Pony")
    Crownpiece: 17-21"
    Cheeks: 5.5"
    Noseband: 24-27"

    Large Pony (500-800 lbs) (Labeled "Small")
    Crownpiece: 18-22"
    Cheeks: 7"
    Noseband: 24-27"

    Cob/Arab (800-1,100 lbs)
    Crownpiece: 20-24"
    Cheeks: 7"
    Noseband: 27-30"

entry.title: Derby Originals Triple Layer Two-Tone Nylon Draft and Horse Halters
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Nylon Halters
Price: 12.99 - 19.99 (9 variants)

Derby Originals Heavy-Duty Triple Layer Two-Tone Nylon Horse Halters are perfect for everyday use thanks to their comfortable fit and sturdy triple-layered construction. These unique halters feature a two-tone design that is sure to stand out when compared to boring, single-colored halters.

Draft: 10" cheek; 17.5" - 22" crown; 35" nose including hardware

  • THE PERFECT EVERYDAY HALTER - our two-tone nylon halters are perfect for everyday use thanks to their comfortable fit and sturdy triple-layered construction.

     
  • DESIGNED TO FIT MOST HORSES - the Full Horse sized halter will fit most average-sized horses such as Quarter Horses and Thoroughbreds, while the Draft sized halter will fit most draft breeds.
  • UNIQUE TWO-TONE DESIGN - these unique halters feature a two-tone design that is sure to stand out when compared to boring, single-colored halters.
  • STURDY DESIGN - this halter is made from heavy-duty triple-layered nylon that is thicker and more durable than other halters which are often only single or double-layered.
  • AVAILABLE IN MULTIPLE COLORS - our nylon halters are available in a wide array of colors to best suit you and your horse!

entry.title: Derby Originals Zebra Print Overlay Nylon Horse Halters
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tack Wholesale
Type: Nylon Halters
Price: 15.99

Derby Originals Zebra Print Overlay Nylon Horse Halters are a colorful alternative to boring, plain colored halters and are perfect for everyday use thanks to their comfortable fit. These sturdy halters are made from double-layered nylon and feature padding along the noseband and crown for a more comfortable and durable fit. Our fun halters are available in three fun zebra print colors to suit you and your horse: Pink/Black, Lime Green/Black, and Black/White!

 

 

  • THE PERFECT EVERYDAY HALTER - our zebra print overlay nylon halters are perfect for everyday use thanks to their comfortable fit.

  • DESIGNED TO FIT MOST HORSES - this halter will fit most average sized horses such as Quarter Horses and Thoroughbreds thanks to its adjustable design.
  • STURDY DESIGN - this halter is made from a sturdy double-layered nylon and features padding along the noseband and crown for a more comfortable and durable fit.
  • PADDED FOR YOUR HORSE’S COMFORT - this colorful halter features padding on the noseband and crown to prevent rubs and make this halter comfortable for long-term wear.
  • AVAILABLE IN THREE COLORS - our nylon halters are available in three fun zebra print colors to suit you and your horse: Pink/Black, Lime Green/Black, and Black/White.

  • Made with 1" durable nylon

entry.title: Weaver Nylon Adjustable Mini Halter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weaver Leather
Type: Nylon Halters
Price: 19.99

Sized perfectly for miniature horses, this 5/8" nylon halter features precise and even stitching and heat-sealed buckle holes.

Average Miniature Size: Cheeks 4 1/4", Noseband 13" - 17", Crown 9" - 13"
  • Brass plated hardware (except looped-on throat snap is non-rust solid brass)
  • Adjustable chin and crown, throat snap for easy on/off
  • Excellent Weaver Leather quality!
